art.author: jodan
art.post: I just finished reading “Heaven is for Real.” Being Catholic I believe there is a wonderful and better life waiting for me, but this book really brought it home. I was completely mesmerized by Akiane’s painting of the Prince of Peace, even more so after seeing it in color. A dear friend of mine is near death as I write this, but as sad as it is to think about I know she has a wonderful journey ahead of her. I await that wonderful journey myself some day..
art.title: Akiane’s Jesus, Heaven is for Real and the Man in the Turin Shroud
